thing-type.label: HDanywhere Multiroom+ HDMI Matrix
thing-type.description: Thing for the HDanywhere Multiroom+ HDMI Matrix

parameter.name: ports
parameter.label: Number of Ports
parameter.description: Specifies the number of input/output ports on the Matrix, e.g. 4 or 8 if 4x4 or 8x8 version of the Matrix

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds to poll the actual state of the Matrix

channel-type.label: Output Port
channel-type.description: The port channel allows to set or read the number of the input port that is connected to the output port. Valid values are 1 to 8 depending on the nature of the Matrix, e.g 4x4 8x8 etc
